awards.description: RIVERWARE RIVER SYSTEM MODELING TOOL IN ORDER TO DEVELOP SCIENCE BASED SUSTAINABILITY STRUCTURE WITHIN THE CHICKASAW NATION TREATY TERRITORY.

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES FUNDING TO . . . [CHICKASAW] UNDER THE SAFE DRINKING WATER ACT (SDWA): SECTION 1452 AND INFRASTRUCTURE INVESTMENT AND JOBS ACT (IIJA) (PL 117-58). THE PURPOSE OF THIS AGREEMENT IS TO IMPLEMENT PROJECTS AND ACTIVITIES THAT ASSIST PUBLIC WATER SYSTEMS SERVING TRIBES TO COMPLY WITH NATIONAL PRIMARY DRINKING WATER REGULATIONS (NPDWRS) OR OTHERWISE FURTHER THE HEALTH PROTECTION OBJECTIVES OF THE SDWA. SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL [THIS GRANT IS TO FUND THE PLANNING OPTIONS FOR OBTAINING NEW WELLS FOR THE CHICKASAW AND CONSIDERING THE BEST LOCATION FOR THE AQUIFER. SURFACE WATER IN THE AREA IS NON-EXISTENT, EXCEPT FOR THE RED RIVER AND LAKE TEXOMA, WHICH ARE BOTH BRACKISH (WITH EXTREMELY HIGH TREATMENT COSTS NEEDED TO MAKE IT POTABLE). THE PROPOSED PROJECT INVOLVES THE IDENTIFICATION OF A PRODUCTIVE PART OF THE AQUIFER THAT DOES NOT AFFECT ANY EXISTING WELLS OWNED BY OTHERS. WELL SITE SELECTION WILL BE BASED ON SEVERAL FACTORS, INCLUDING DISTANCE TO THE FACILITY AND ESTIMATED AQUIFER PRODUCTIVITY FROM THE GROUNDWATER MODEL. THE CHOICE OF SITE(S) WILL BE CONFIRMED WITH AN ELECTRO-RESISTIVITY SURVEY (REMOTE SENSING OF THE GEOPHYSICAL PROPERTIES OF THE AQUIFER). FINALLY, A TEST WELL(S) WILL BE DRILLED, AND A PUMP TEST CONDUCTED, TO CONFIRM AQUIFER PRODUCTIVITY AND VERIFY WATER QUALITY. UPON SELECTING THE WELL FIELD SITE, PIPELINE, PUMP AND ASSOCIATED STRUCTURES WILL BE DESIGNED BY AN ACCREDITED ENGINEERING FIRM].
. 
ACTIVITIES:THE ACTIVITIES INCLUDE .

1)	UTILIZE THE 2023 HALFF ENGINEERING ANTLERS AQUIFER REPORT AND DESKTOP GEOLOGICAL EVALUATIONS TO LOCATE A HIGH PROBABILITY WATER SUPPLY AREA IN THE AQUIFER. $20,000
-	EVALUATE YIELD FROM EXISTING NEARBY WELLS.
-	DETERMINE POTENTIAL PRODUCTION FROM DEVELOPMENT OF WELL FIELD.
-	DETERMINE WELL FIELD LAND REQUIREMENTS AND COST ESTIMATE. 
-	WELL FIELD CONFIGURATION, DESIGN, SPACING, ETC.
2)	PERFORM A ELECTRO-RESISTIVITY STUDY TO LOCATE PRIME WELL SITES. $90,000
-	ESTIMATE HIGHEST YIELD LOCATIONS FROM SURVEY.
-	DETERMINE WATER WELL DRILL SITES.
3)	DRILL TEST WELL(S) TO DETERMINE YIELD AND ASCERTAIN WATER QUALITY. $250,000
-	DEVELOPMENT OF A QAPP FOR WATER WELL QUALITY ASSESSMENT 
-	PERFORM WATER QUALITY TESTING. 
4)	COMPLETE PUMP TESTING. DESIGN PIPELINE AND PUMPS TO CONVEY WATER TO WINSTAR. $150,000
-	ENGINEERING ANALYSIS FOR PIPELINE CONNECTION.
SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:THE ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES INCLUDE . . . [IDENTIFY SUITABLE LOCATION FOR WELLS BY DRILLING TEST WELLS AND IDENTIFYING WATER QUALITY AND YIELD OF WELL]. 

THE EXPECTED OUTCOMES INCLUDE . . . [WELL FIELD CONFIGURATION, DESIGN, SPACING, ETC.
PERFORM A ELECTRO-RESISTIVITY STUDY TO LOCATE PRIME WELL SITES. ESTIMATE HIGHEST YIELD LOCATIONS FROM SURVEY FOR A DRINKING WATER SOURCE]. 

THE INTENDED BENEFICIARIES INCLUDE . . . [CHICKASAW TRIBE AND ALL THOSE THAT USE THE DRINKING WATER ONSITE].

 
.
